sqlMap.select: SELECT count(*) as contador, h.id as id FROM hito h LEFT JOIN hito_dispositivo hu ON h.id = hu.id_hito WHERE h.id_ruta = #id:INTEGER# AND identificado = 1 GROUP by id_hito
SELECT count(*) as contador, h.id as id FROM hito h LEFT JOIN hito_dispositivo hu ON h.id = hu.id_hito WHERE h.id_ruta = #id:INTEGER# AND identificado = 0 GROUP by id_hito

SELECT h.* FROM hito_dispositivo hd INNER JOIN dispositivo d ON hd.id_dispositivo = d.id INNER JOIN usuario u ON u.id_dispositivo = d.id INNER JOIN hito h ON h.id = hd.id_hito WHERE u.id= #id:INTEGER#

SELECT r.* FROM ruta r INNER JOIN (SELECT h.id_ruta, count(*) AS contador FROM hito_dispositivo hd INNER JOIN dispositivo d ON hd.id_dispositivo = d.id INNER JOIN usuario u ON u.id_dispositivo = d.id INNER JOIN hito h ON h.id = hd.id_hito WHERE u.id=#id:INTEGER# GROUP BY h.id_ruta) h ON r.id = h.id_ruta WHERE h.contador >= r.hitos_necesarios

SELECT count(*) FROM(SELECT r.id, r.nombre, hitos_necesarios, count(*) as checkin FROM ruta r INNER JOIN hito h ON h.id_ruta = r.id INNER JOIN hito_dispositivo hd ON hd.id_hito = h.id WHERE r.id = #id:INTEGER# GROUP BY id_dispositivo) tabla WHERE checkin = hitos_necesarios OR checkin > hitos_necesarios
SELECT fecha FROM hito_dispositivo WHERE id_hito=#idHito:INTEGER# AND id_dispositivo=#idDipositivoUsuario:INTEGER#
